"The Friend List": "You can access a list of players who have become your Friends by selecting <yellow>\"Communication\"<c> from the main menu, then selecting <yellow>\"Friend List\"<c>. From here, you can check their login status and send them whisper chat."
"To invite someone to be your Friend, select \"Communication\" from the main menu, then \"Nearby Players\", select the player you wish to invite, then select \"Send Friend Request\"."
